org.apache.jmeter.protocol.http.control

类 HeaderManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.jmeter.testelement.AbstractTestElement
      • org.apache.jmeter.config.ConfigTestElement
        • org.apache.jmeter.protocol.http.control.HeaderManager
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, ConfigElement, Replaceable, Searchable, TestElement

    public class HeaderManager
extends ConfigTestElement
implements java.io.Serializable, Replaceable
    This class provides an interface to headers file to pass HTTP headers along with a request.
    另请参阅:

      • save

        public void save(java.lang.String headFile)
          throws java.io.IOException
        Save the header data to a file.
        参数:
        headFile - name of the file to store headers into. If name is relative the system property user.dir will be prepended
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - if writing the headers fails

      • addFile

        public void addFile(java.lang.String headerFile)
             throws java.io.IOException
        Add header data from a file.
        参数:
        headerFile - name of the file to read headers from. If name is relative the system property user.dir will be prepended
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - if reading headers fails

      • add

        public void add(Header h)
        Add a header.
        参数:
        h - Header to add

      • add

        public void add()
        Add an empty header.

      • remove

        public void remove(int index)
        Remove a header.
        参数:
        index - index from the header to remove

        Return the number of headers.

        public Header get(int i)
        Return the header at index i.

        返回:

      • removeHeaderNamed

        public void removeHeaderNamed(java.lang.String name)
        Remove from Headers the header named name
        参数:
        name - header name

      • merge

        @Deprecated
public HeaderManager merge(TestElement element,
                                       boolean preferLocalValues)
        已过时。 since 3.2, use merge(TestElement) as this method will be removed in a future version
        Merge the attributes with a another HeaderManager's attributes.
        参数:
        element - The object to be merged with
        preferLocalValues - Not used
        返回:
        merged HeaderManager
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if element is not an instance of HeaderManager

      • merge

        public HeaderManager merge(TestElement element)
        Merge the attributes with a another HeaderManager's attributes.
        参数:
        element - The object to be merged with
        返回:
        merged HeaderManager
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if element is not an instance of HeaderManager

      • replace

        public int replace(java.lang.String regex,
                   java.lang.String replaceBy,
                   boolean caseSensitive)
            throws java.lang.Exception
        从接口复制的说明: Replaceable
        Replace in object by replaceBy
        指定者:
        replace 在接口中 Replaceable
        参数:
        regex - Regular expression to search for
        replaceBy - Text used as replacement
        caseSensitive - flag, whether search should be done case sensitive
        返回:
        number of replacements
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - when something fails while replacing
